com.github.flowersinthesand.spheres

Interface AppInside

  • All Superinterfaces:
    App
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultApp

    public interface AppInside
extends App
    The AppInside provides services for internal use only and any operation on this instance affects only local application.

    This interface is not designed to be used by the application developer.

    Author:
    Donghwan Kim

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void install()
      Initializes the application.
      Options options()
      Returns the read-only options used to create.
      ConcurrentMap<String,Socket> sockets()
      Returns a map of WsSocket and HttpSocket.
